javadoc.name: CorpProjectIdentifier
javadoc.comment:
Represents the corporate project object by encapsulating a subset of its attributes.

This class uses a numerical corporate project ID and a name attribute to represent the corporate project object in LCS. These attributes are sufficient for operations performed by LCS modules.
javadoc.author: Brian Wing Shun Chan
Marko Cikos

method.name: equals
method.comment:
Returns true if this object equals the obj object.

This method compares object references. If the references match it returns true. If obj object is a {@link CorpProjectIdentifier} instance, the corporate project ID attributes are compared.

return.comment: true if this object equals the obj object, false otherwise

param.name: corpProjectId
param.comment: the primary key of the corporate project
